name: KOSMO AZS
description:
Welcome to the early cyberpunk of Russia!

Welcome to Moscow 2033 - the world of early cyberpunk, where technology and science merge with a dark and exciting reality! Here, on the streets of this great city, you will encounter the technology of the future, the characters of the future of Russia and the possibility of choosing the development of their history.
Be ready to explore this unique world where your every choice and action can have far-reaching consequences.
Join us and plunge into the Russian atmosphere of early cyberpunk-Moscow 2033!

Plot

Father Vitaly, who works at a space refueling station, is trying to provide for his daughter Anya and is faced with criminal elements. He finds himself caught up in their intrigues, and his life becomes more and more dangerous. But Father Vitaly is ready for anything for the sake of his daughter and is trying to get out of this situation without losing hope for a better future for both of them.

Gameplay

In the game you can draw a landing route line and shoot down meteorites. You can also buy various modules for your space station to make your work easier, but not your life.

Setting

We tried to make the game atmospheric and familiar to you. Inspired by partial progress, five-storey buildings and our nature. We have tried our best to plunge you into something familiar and at the same time new!
